::: Hell Beast growled ::: Transanulas, Gremlin, Jackle, Black Aracnia, and 
Transanulas, return to the ship with me. Inferno, Marine, and rampage, stay 
here. Your under Shukos command for now.

::: Hell Beast and his troops returned home. They entered the base and 
recived Scourges message about Vuloris. Hell Beast decided enough was enough. 
He entered there lab, followed by Transanulas, Gremlin, Jackle, Pheniox, and 
Black Aracnia. :::

::: Hell Beast, with the TM3 driver in his hands ::: I know about your sick 
little scheme. You missed a bug, his name was Scourge.

::: With that, he threw the TM3 drive to the floor and stamped it to peices. 
The Predacons drew there wepons :::

::: Hell Beast ::: Now surrender your wepons, and go peacefully to the Brig 
until we have a trial. Or, you could get shot right now, and scince were 
blocking the only exit in the room, I suggest you take the first option.
